newsitem.title: BULGARIA: WEATHER FORECAST - BULGARIA - MAY 22 - SUNNY, WARM.
newsitem.headline: WEATHER FORECAST - BULGARIA - MAY 22 - SUNNY, WARM.

text.p: Sunny and warm across the country, with rain expected later in the day in the northern regions, state radio said.
Maximum air temperatures are expected between 24 and 28 degrees, temperature in Sofia is seen at about 25 degrees. -- Sofia Newsroom, 359-2-91188
